SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Alavanca
Represents a lever puzzle with a fixed number of levers, each associated with a specific effect.
AlavancaEnum
Enum the possivels efects of an trigger in a division
Bot
Represents an AI-controlled player (bot) in the labyrinth game.
CorredorEvento
Represents the type of events that can occur on the way to a divison.
Dificuldade
Represents the difficulty level used in the game,
Divisao
Represents a single room (or division) in the labyrinth.
Enigma
Represents a riddle (enigma) that can be presented to a player or bot.
EnigmaLoader
Class responsible for loading Enigma instances from an JSON file.
EventoAleatorio
Represents a random event that can affect one or more players in the game.
EventoCorredor
Represents an event associated with a corridor between two divisions.
GameData
Class that groups together all core runtime data of a game session.
GameEngine
Core game engine that controls the main loop, player turns, movement, puzzles enigmas, levers, traps and victory detection.
GameExporter
Responsible for exporting a GameReport to a JSON file.
GameInitializer
Handles the initial game setup.
GameReport
Represents the summary of GameReport
GameReport.EnigmaEvent
Represents a single enigma interaction for a player: the room where it occurred, the question, the answer, whether it was solved and the effect applied.
GameReport.PlayerReport
Class that stores all information about a single player in a game.
GameReportLoader
 
GameView
This class responsible for all user interaction for the labyrinth game
LabyrinthGraph<T>
Graph representation for the labyrinth game.
Main
Entry point of the application.
MapaNode<K,V>
Represents a generic key-value pair to be stored in a dictionary/map structure.
MapExporter
Class responsible for exporting a LabyrinthGraph to a JSON file.
MapGenerator
Class responsible for generating the labyrinth maps
MapLoader
Utility class responsible for loading a labyrinth map from a JSON file
Menu
Main menu of the game, including map loading, creation, and the interactive editor.
Player
Represents a player in the labyrinth.
TipoDivisao
Represents the type of an division in the labyrinth map.
TipoEvento
Represents the different types of random events that can occur to a player.
TurnManager
Manages the turn order of the game.
